attributes.action: Amnesty for Undocumented Migrants in England
attributes.additional_details:
Moreover, they could help with the crisis we are facing in the world and in the nation and could have a fulfilled life as well. 
If that is too difficult, then how come some nations are able to do that! Ireland, USA have granted amnesty to Undocumented Migrants residing in their territories this year.
attributes.background:
Grant an amnesty to Undocumented Migrants residing in England. 
Alot of people with talents and gifts are stuck, stress out and cannot go on with their life. Those people could be very helpful to the community, the nation, the nation's economy wellbeing.

rejection.details:
We think these petitions are similar

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611472
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608918

If you'd like something different, you could start a new petition setting out what.
